text: sæma atmayakma taman kala pinda, taman kala pavda pratyaksava dakina dinadi (duk vi) tamantat eyatat atare dirgha duras pramanayak haras viya yutu novedæyi kæmati vanu æta. ebævin allah obata taman gæna (biya ganva) anaturu angavanneya. (mandayat) allah tama vahalun kerehi adhika vasayen dayabarava sitinneya
